languages.text: "Витражи, трон, прислуга... Да уж, по сравнению с Ямой у вас тут настоящий дворец! Хотя, признаться, я уже почти скучаю по ее незамысловатой, но уютной убогости. Почти".
"Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss the simple but cosy squalor. Almost."
languages.original_text: "Витражи, трон, прислуга... Да уж, по сравнению с Ямой у вас тут настоящий дворец! Хотя, признаться, я уже почти скучаю по ее незамысловатой, но уютной убогости. Почти".

traits.locale_text: "Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you truly have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss its unsophisticated but cozy squalor. Almost."
"Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you truly have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss its unsophisticated but cozy squalor. Almost."
"Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss the simple but cosy squalor. Almost."
"Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss the simple but cosy squalor. Almost."
"Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss the simple but cosy squalor. Almost."

languages.text: “彩色玻璃窗、宝座、仆人……和那座竞技场相比，您的宫殿可真是名副其实啊！不过我得承认，我已经几乎要怀念起那简单而舒适的蜗居了。几乎。”
languages.original_text: "Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss the simple but cosy squalor. Almost."

traits.locale_text: “彩色玻璃窗、宝座、仆人……和那座竞技场相比，您的宫殿可真是名副其实啊！不过我得承认，我已经几乎要怀念起那简单而舒适的蜗居了。几乎。”

languages.text: « Des vitraux, un trône, des serviteurs... C'est un véritable palais, comparé à la Fosse ! Toutefois, je dois avouer que la simplicité douillette de ce taudis me manquerait presque. J'ai bien dit "presque". »
languages.original_text: "Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss the simple but cosy squalor. Almost."

traits.locale_text: « Des vitraux, un trône, des serviteurs... C'est un véritable palais, comparé à la Fosse ! Toutefois, je dois avouer que la simplicité douillette de ce taudis me manquerait presque. J'ai bien dit "presque". »

languages.text: 「ステンドグラスの窓、王座、下僕たち…ピットに比べたら、ここは正真正銘の城ですな！でも正直に言うと、簡素ながらも居心地のよい、あのむさ苦しさがちょっとだけ恋しくなります。ちょっとだけですが」
languages.original_text: "Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss the simple but cosy squalor. Almost."

traits.locale_text: 「ステンドグラスの窓、王座、下僕たち…ピットに比べたら、ここは正真正銘の城ですな！でも正直に言うと、簡素ながらも居心地のよい、あのむさ苦しさがちょっとだけ恋しくなります。ちょっとだけですが」

languages.text: «Vidrieras tintadas, un trono, sirvientes... En comparación con el Foso, ¡esto sí que es un palacio! Y, sin embargo, casi echo de menos esa miseria sencilla pero acogedora. Solo casi».
languages.original_text: "Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss the simple but cosy squalor. Almost."

traits.locale_text: «Vidrieras tintadas, un trono, sirvientes... En comparación con el Foso, ¡esto sí que es un palacio! Y, sin embargo, casi echo de menos esa miseria sencilla pero acogedora. Solo casi».

languages.text: "Buntglasfenster, ein Thron, Diener ... Im Vergleich zum Loch habt Ihr hier ja einen richtigen Palast! Ich muss jedoch gestehen, dass ich das simple, aber gemütliche Elend fast schon vermisse. Fast."
languages.original_text: "Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss the simple but cosy squalor. Almost."

traits.locale_text: "Buntglasfenster, ein Thron, Diener ... Im Vergleich zum Loch habt Ihr hier ja einen richtigen Palast! Ich muss jedoch gestehen, dass ich das simple, aber gemütliche Elend fast schon vermisse. Fast."

languages.text: "Vitraylar, taht, hizmetkârlar... Çukur'a kıyasla gerçek bir sarayınız var! Yine de itiraf etmeliyim, basit ama rahat sefaleti neredeyse özleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Stained glass windows, a throne, servants... Compared to the Pit, you have a veritable palace! However, I confess I almost miss the simple but cosy squalor. Almost."
